name: Sam/Sara
description:
Every death is the start of a new life, try to make it past obstacles on your way to the afterlife.

(Characters and building models from https://quaternius.com/ Music: Planeteer Reaction from https://freepd.com/misc.php)

In this game you play as a character that has just died and is thrust into a situation where they are flying through the air, whilst flying through the air they must dodge obstacles in order to make it to their afterlife, but dont worry if they dont make it as they will continuously reincarnate until they do!

What reward will they get in the afterlife? Play the game and help them get there to find out!

Controls:

WASD to control the character!

Esc to pause the game! When paused M to go to the menu Q to quit!

I've noticed some bugs in the browser version and cant seem to fix them, they dont seem to be game breaking though and everything seems to work fine on the download version. For example getting to the end in browser doesn't show the end screen properly and the options in the option menu stop working.
